column1: When I work in a group I do higher quality work.
The material is easier to understand when I work with other students.
My group members help explain things that I do not understand.
I feel working in groups is a waste of time.
The work takes more time to complete when I work with other students.
The workload is usually less when I work with other students.
My group members respect my opinions.
My group members make me feel that I am not as smart as they are.
My group members do not care about my feelings.
I feel I am part of what is going on in the group.
When I work in a group, I am able to share my ideas.
Everyoneâ€™s ideas are needed if we are going to be successful.
We cannot complete the assignment unless everyone contributes.
I let the other students do most of the work.
I also learn when I teach the material to my group members.
I learn to work with students who are different from me.
I become frustrated when my group members do not understand the material.
When I work with other students, we spend too much time talking about other things.
I have to work with students who are not as smart as I am.
